Package pacman.util

Enum GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<GameManager>
      • pacman.util.GameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GameManager>
    public enum GameManager
extends java.lang.Enum<GameManager>

    GameManager

    A GameManager is an object of utility to manage the game status and process globally, and reflect the realtime results in the UI.

    Note: this class is implemented an Enum, thus to be a singleton class.

    Usage: 

        GameManager.INSTANCE.{ANY_METHOD_HERE}()
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Song Zhang
    See Also:
    GameController, GameStatus

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      INSTANCE
      The shared instance for global use.

      • init

        public void init​(Map map,
                 GameController gameController)
        Initializes the game properties based on the given Map and updates UI via GameController.
        Parameters:
        map - the current Map
        gameController - the GameController linked to the current displayed UI

      • getGameStatus

        public GameStatus getGameStatus()
        Returns the current GameStatus.
        Returns:
        the current GameStatus

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Starts the game.

        This method calls wakeUpGhosts() and set the gameStatus to GameStatus.START.

      • pauseGame

        public void pauseGame()
        Pauses the game.

        This method calls freezeGhosts() and set the gameStatus to GameStatus.PAUSE.

      • loseGame

        public void loseGame()
        Loses the game.

        This method calls endGame(), calculateScore() and navigateBack() to the Select scene.

      • winGame

        public void winGame()
        Wins the game.

        This method calls endGame(), calculateScore() and navigateBack() to the Select scene.

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        Ends the game.

        This method calls freezeGhosts() and set the gameStatus to GameStatus.END.

      • handleGhostTouched

        public void handleGhostTouched​(Ghost ghost)
        This method is called when any Ghost is touching the Pacman.
        Parameters:
        ghost - the Ghost touching the Pacman

      • handleCookieTouched

        public void handleCookieTouched​(Cookie cookie)
        This method is called when any Cookie is touching the Pacman.
        Parameters:
        cookie - the Cookie touching the Pacman

      • handleKeyPressed

        public void handleKeyPressed​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        This method is called when any key is pressed.
        Parameters:
        event - the KeyEvent happens when the key is pressed.

      • handleKeyReleased

        public void handleKeyReleased​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        This method is called when any key is released.
        Parameters:
        event - the KeyEvent happens when the key is released.

      • wakeUpGhosts

        private void wakeUpGhosts()
        Wakes up all Ghosts to make them move.

      • freezeGhosts

        private void freezeGhosts()
        Freezes all Ghosts to make them not able to move.

      • sendPacmanToSpawn

        private void sendPacmanToSpawn()
        Sends Pacman to the Spawn.

      • initUi

        private void initUi()
        Initializes the UI (title, score count, life count).

      • updateUi

        private void updateUi()
        Updates the UI (life count, score count).

      • calculateScore

        private void calculateScore()
        Calculates the final Score and writes it into a corresponding file.

      • checkWin

        private void checkWin()
        Tests if all cookies are eaten. If true, calls winGame().

      • navigateBack

        private void navigateBack()
        Navigates back to the Select scene, and pops up the ScoreBoard stage at the same time.
